compliant.section: 本網站/本應用程式取得的個人資料，僅供參與之活動或業務原來所說明的特定目的和範圍加以處理利用，除非事先說明並取得您的同意、或依相關法律規定
compliant.legal provisions: Data must only be collected for specified, explicit and legitimate purposes and not further processed in a manner that is incompatible with those purposes.  Processing is lawful if  processing is necessary for the performance of a contract to which the data subject is party or in order to take steps at the request of the data subject prior to entering into a contract.

compliant.section: 本行並將依法令規範對前述個人資料負保密之責
compliant.legal provisions: Taking into account the state of the art, the costs of implementation and the nature, scope, context and purposes of processing as well as the risk of varying likelihood and severity for the rights and freedoms of natural persons, the controller and the processor shall implement appropriate technical and organisational measures to ensure a level of security appropriate to the risk, including inter alia as appropriate:  the ability to ensure the ongoing confidentiality, integrity, availability and resilience of processing systems and services.

compliant.section: 為確保資料傳輸的安全，本行採用各項先進的安全機制並採用被第三方公正機構所信任、及驗證完整憑證鏈，提供全程的資料加密功能，以確保資料在傳遞過程中的隱密性及完整性。並加裝防火牆輔以入侵偵測系統，防止不法侵入及惡意程式之破壞，強化資料傳輸、儲存及運用之安全。

non_compliant.section: 請您注意，與本網站/本應用程式連結的其他網站，也可能蒐集您個人的資料，對於您於前述其他連結網站主動提供的個人資料，不適用本行之隱私權保護聲明，將依相關法令及各該連結網站所揭露之隱私權保護聲明蒐集、處理與利用，本行不負擔任何連帶責任。
non_compliant.legal provisions: The controller shall implement appropriate technical and organisational measures for ensuring that, by default, only personal data which are necessary for each specific purpose of the processing are processed.  This obligation applies to the amount of personal data collected, the extent of their processing, the period of their storage and their accessibility.
non_compliant.amend: This section disclaims liability for data collected by third-party websites linked on the website. Under the GDPR, controllers are jointly liable for data processed by third parties on their behalf. The policy should clarify liability for data processing by third parties and ensure appropriate safeguards are in place.

non_compliant.section: Cookies 是伺服端為區別使用者的不同喜好，經由瀏覽器寫入使用者硬碟的一些簡短資訊。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Processing shall be lawful only if and to the extent that at least one of the following applies: the data subject has given consent to the processing of his or her personal data for one or more specific purposes;  Where processing is based on consent, the controller shall be able to demonstrate that the data subject has consented to processing of his or her personal data.
non_compliant.amend: This section mentions the use of cookies but does not specify the purposes for which they are used or the legal basis for processing this data. The policy should clearly state the specific purposes for using cookies and obtain consent if required under GDPR.
